title: 3dRowFillin
description: Fills in blank regions in 1D rows extracted from a 3D dataset

maxgap.title: Maximum Gap
maxgap.description: Set the maximum length of a blank region that will be filled in

dir.title: Direction of Fill
dir.description: Set the direction of fill, e.g., A-P, P-A, I-S, S-I, L-R, R-L, x, y, z, XYZ.OR, XYZ.AND

binary.title: Binary Flag
binary.description: Turn input dataset to binary (0 and 1) before filling in. Output will also be binary.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Set the prefix for the output dataset
